hero-text: We partner with ambitious businesses and professionals to unlock growth through tailored HR solutions, recruitment intelligence, and workforce strategy.

aboutIntro.title: Who We Are
aboutIntro.description: With over 15 years of experience in HR, Reference Agency specializes in technology hiring, HR consultancy, and outsourcing services. We partner with ambitious businesses across Egypt, KSA, UAE—and soon the entire MENA region—to solve their most critical HR challenges and elevate workforce performance. We’re not just recruiters. We’re your strategic partner—turning talent strategy into business growth through smart, scalable, people-first solutions.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: We build strong, lasting relationships, deliver exceptional results, adapt to dynamic business needs, and uphold the highest standards of trust and transparency.
